about: Head of Technology with dual expertise: Strategic Management of multidisciplinary teams and technical specialization in scalable SaaS architectures. Led teams of up to 15+ developers in creating enterprise platforms for Mary Kay, Smart House and other clients, combining business vision with technical excellence. As a manager, I define technology roadmaps, implement DevOps culture (CI/CD, KPIs) and develop talent. As a specialist, I master full stack (React, Node.js, Next.js) and apply AI/automation to optimize operations. My differentiator is translating business strategy into technological solutions that generate measurable impact.
